song.englishname: In The Blink Of An Eye

english.segment1: You put me here for a reason. You have a mission for me. You knew my name and You called it. Long before I learned to breathe
english.segment2: Sometimes I feel disappointed. By the way I spend my time. How can I further Your kingdom. When I'm so wrapped up in mine
english.segment3: In a Blink of an eye that is when. I'll be closer to You than I've ever been. Time will fly, but until then. I'll embrace every moment I'm given. There's a reason I'm alive for a blink of an eye
english.segment4: And though I'm living a good life. Can my life be something great?. I have to answer the question. Before it's too late
english.segment5: Cause in a Blink of an eye that is when. I'll be closer to You than I've ever been. Time will fly, but until then. I'll embrace every moment I'm given. There's a reason I'm alive for a blink of an eye
english.segment6: If I give the very best of me. That becomes my legacy. So tell me what am I waiting for?. What am I waiting for?
english.segment7: In a Blink of an eye that is when. I'll be closer to You than I've ever been. Time will fly, but until then. I'll embrace every moment I'm given
english.segment8: In a Blink of an eye that is when. I'll be closer to You than I've ever been. Time will fly, but until then. I'll embrace every moment I'm given. There's a reason I'm alive for a blink of an eye
